name: Aurora Fight (Henrique Gonçalves)
description:
Aurora Fight it's a beat 'em up game developed by Tetraedro Studio and inspired by the 80s atmosphere. The political system is corrupted. The city has falling to the edge of oblivion. The chaos and the crime took over the streets of Aurora. The violence has reached its peak, no place is more safer. Risking their lives to restore peace, they confront aggressiveness even of those who once swore to protect us. Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/aurorafightgame/

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/aurorafight/  ↓↓↓ NOTE VERSION ALPHA 0.2-  29/01/2018 !!! ↓↓↓

- This version  has support partial for joystick.

- Bugs fixed

- Game with better performace

ATTENTION: For some interactions, it is necessary to use the mouse.

 ↓↓↓ IMPORTANT!!! ↓↓↓

Aurora Fight does NOT need to be installed.

Available only in SINGLE PLAYER mode.

Commands:

Movement - ARROW KEYS or "W", "A", "S", "D".

"P" - Pause "G" - Punch1 / Pick Weapon  "H" - Kick / Pick Weapon "J" - Punch2 / Pick Weapon "R" - Rage (Special)
